description: This file defines the FavoritesProvider class which manages a set of favorite book IDs, allowing loading from storage, toggling favorites, and persistence.

classes.name: FavoritesProvider
classes.description: A provider class to manage favorite book IDs, with methods for loading, toggling, and persisting favorites.

methods.name: FavoritesProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with a LocalStorageService instance.

methods.name: loadFromStorage
methods.description: Loads the favorite IDs from local storage and notifies listeners.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Adds or removes a book ID from favorites and persists the change.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if a given book ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: _persist
methods.description: Saves the current favorites to local storage and notifies listeners.

methods.name: favorites
methods.description: Getter that returns the current set of favorite IDs.
